title: Software Engineer (Healthcare) - Remote
full_description: MISSION OF THE POSITIONThe Software Development Team Lead will be part of an agile development team, building and working on web-based business applications. The Software Development Team Lead will provide technical and team leadership through coaching and mentorship.JOB TITLESoftware Development Team LeadDEPARTMENT Research & DevelopmentREPORTS TODirector R&DFLSA STATUS/EXEMPTION ExemptESSENTIAL DUTIES· Guide team development efforts towards successful project delivery.· Demonstrate the DevOps tools, process, and culture changes in the form of written documentation and oral presentations to include roadmaps of changes across the various practice areas and high-level technical design/architecture documents· Maintain high standards of software quality within the team by establishing good practices and habits.· Identify and encourage areas for growth and improvement within the team.· Collaborate with other software developers, business analysts and software architects to plan, design, develop, test, and maintain web- based business applications· Assist in the collection and documentation of user's requirements, development of user stories, estimates and work plans.· Prepare reports, manuals and other documentation on the status, operation and maintenance of software.· Design, develop, and unit test applications in accordance with established standards.· Participate in peer-reviews of solution designs and related code.· Package and support deployment of releases.· Work with teammates in the migration of legacy applications to current Microsoft technologies.· Develop, refine, and tune integrations between applications.· Analyze and resolve technical and application problems.· Assess opportunities for application and process improvement and prepare documentation of rationale to share with team members and other affected parties.· Adhere to high-quality development principles while delivering solutions on-time and on-budget.· Provide third-level support to business users.· Research and evaluate a variety of software products.COMPETENCIESEDUCATION· Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent.CERTIFICATIONS & LICENSES· n/aEXPERIENCE· 5+ years’ experience as a Software Developer· Prior experience in a technical lead positionTALENTS· Designing and developing user interfaces using AngularJS best practices.· Adapting interface for modern internet applications using the latest front-end technologies.· Writing JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.· Proficient with Microsoft .NET 3.5+ development using C#· Experience with web development technologies including ASP.NET, MVC3, JavaScript, AJAX and CSS· Experience with database development including relational database design, SQL and ORM· Extensive experience designing and developing enterprise grade software· Experience with source control management systems and continuous integration/deployment environments· Experience with automated testing· Experience with agile development methodologies including Kanban and Scrum· Experience with multi-threading and concurrency· Experience with debugging, performance profiling and optimization· Comprehensive understanding of object-oriented and service-oriented application development techniques and theories· Internally motivated, able to work proficiently both independently and in a team environment· Strong communication skills with both internal team members and external business stakeholders· Strong initiative to find ways to improve solutions, systems, and processes· Preferred Competency Requirements technologies· Experience with user interface design and prototyping
